column1: The Purple Pig////The bone marrow came out topped with this cilantro and onion mix that was tossed in some kind of oil (or maybe even the marrow juices)
column2: with some salt on the side
column4: and the humongous bone that was the star of the show. The kind server instructed us to spread the marrow on the bread
column5: toss some of the cilantro mix on top
column6: and sprinkle some salt. My skin pricked right up on my first bite and I got the shivers
column7: it was that good! I normally hate cilantro
column8: but everything just went great together.
